title: Growing Ear Drums with Prof Atlas (407)
description: Dr Karl uncovers a life long Australian quest to restore comfort and hearing with custom made eardrum transplants. Called Cleardrums, Prof Atlas is close to passing regulatory hurdles for human trials. drkarl.com
excerpt: Dr Karl uncovers a life long Australian quest to restore comfort and hearing with custom made eardrum transplants. Called Cleardrums, Prof Atlas is close to passing regulatory hurdles for human trials.
text: About the Podcast Dr Karl’s a curious optimist – a great combination for a science lover. Join him and his guests for weird facts, amazing conversation and remember, it’s never too late for a happy childhood. https://drkarl.com/
html:
About the Podcast

Dr Karl’s a curious optimist – a great combination for a science lover. Join him and his guests for weird facts, amazing conversation and remember, it’s never too late for a happy childhood. https://drkarl.com/
